title: Rift's Author Page

[[div class="turbo-block bg-black border-white text-white"data-title="MI13 FILE: MEGAN"]]
[[=]]
**CODENAME:** riftwqlker

**SPECIALTY:** Humanoids

**AGE:** Who's keeping track?


[[/=]]

HI, I'M RIFTWQLKER!

I write the skips, and make them dance.

Please read my works.

Please read my works.

[[div class="offset-left left-4"]]
[[div class="turbo-block bg-white border-black text-black"]]
And now, a poem, if you will.

"You may know me as spiderman
(wow!)
But you may also know me as that
homeless heroin addict 
I need to go now bye"
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

Please read my works.
[[/div]]



~~~~
